  • Bloggerable v1.0.0

Tables

Tables are a nice way to organize a lot of data. We provide a few utility classes to help you style your table as easily as possible.

Examples

Default

Table headingTable headingTable headingTable heading
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
<table class="table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
    </tr>
    ...
  </tbody>
</table>

Light

Table headingTable headingTable headingTable heading
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
<!-- Light -->
<table class="table table-light">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
    </tr>
    ...
  </tbody>
</table>

      <th>Table heading</th>

      <td>Table cell</td>

    </tr>

</table>

  <thead class="thead-light">
    <tr>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>

      <td>Table cell</td>

</table>
